parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the process to start.

200.description: A message indicating whether the process was started successfully.

400.description: No name parameter specified in request.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the process to stop.

200.description: A message indicating whether the process was stopped successfully.

400.description: No name parameter specified in request.

get.description: Retrieves the status of an existing process.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the process to retrieve the status of.

200.description: The current status of the process, which can be "running" or "stopped".

400.description: No name parameter specified in request.

get.description: Retrieves the result of an existing process.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the process to retrieve the result of.

200.description: The result of the process, which may vary depending on the specific process being run.

400.description: No name parameter specified in request.
